metadata.title: Friday, 21st February, 2020
metadata.session: FOURTH SESSION OF THE TWELFTH ASSEMBLY

questions.minister: Minister of Chiefs and Traditional Affairs
parts: (a) where the boundary between Mwinuna and Mkubwe Chiefdoms lies;
(b) in which district Chief Mwinuna’s chiefdom is;
(c) whether it is possible for one chiefdom to cover two (2) or more:
(i) districts; and (ii) provinces; and
(d) if so, how the development is coordinated from the national to the district level, and ultimately to the chiefdom.
(a) whether the Government has any plans to deploy additional medical personnel to all the health facilities in Siavonga District;
(b) if so, when the plans will be implemented; and
(c) which categories of personnel will be deployed.
(a) whether the Government is aware that the construction of Chanyalubwe Secondary School in Lumezi District, which is funded by the World Bank, has stalled;
(b) if so, why the project has stalled;
(c) when construction works will resume;
(d) what the total cost of the outstanding works is; and
(e) what the time frame for the completion of the remaining works is.
(a) whether the Government has any plans to re-introduce the following under the Zambia National Service:
(i) rural reconstruction centres; and (ii) compulsory National Youth Service skills training for school leavers;
(b) if so, when the plans will be implemented; and
(c) if there are no such plans, why.

questions.minister: Minister of Housing and Infrastructure Development
parts: (a) whether the Government has any plans to construct a bridge across the Zambezi River to connect Zambezi West Parliamentary Constituency to the rest of Zambezi District;
(b) if so, when the plans will be implemented;
(c) what the estimated cost of the project is; and
(d) what the estimated time frame for the completion of the project is.
(a)      whether the Government has any plans to build a modern hospital in Luwingu District; and

(b)     if so, when the plans will be implemented. ORDER OF THE DAY 1. The National Planning and Budgeting Bill                                                 (N. A. B. 22 /2019) Second Reading __________________________
